message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product which I believe would be incredibly valuable to you. I'm asking for $11,500.  I think it's a fair price considering its potential worth.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,500. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
Bob, I understand your position, but $10,500 is cutting it too close to my bottom line.  How about we meet in the middle at $11,000?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go above $10,500. Would you be willing to consider this price?
